    Bose Corporation
    Bose Corporation is a privately held American corporation, based in Framingham, Massachusetts, that designs, develops and sells audio equipment. Founded in 1964 by Amar Bose, the company sells its products throughout the world. Wikipedia
    Customer service: 1 (800) 379-2073
    Technical support: 1 (800) 380-4831
    Sales: 1 (800) 999-2673
    Headquarters: Framingham, MA
    Founder: Amar Bose
    Founded: 1964
